2. You don't have to mention log/notebooks under data, you can list these only under documentation. 
4. Are you using any metadata generated by instrument software during measurements? You also mention text metadata under 2, does this follow a metadata standard or did you make your own metadata list? 
7. Sharing: KU Leuven now has its own repository RDR (www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/rdr) which you can consider using for data sharing and preservation instead of Zenodo.
